Reviews.Content: location simply perfect 14th floor view city price excellent location hotel run hasnt looked food restaurant isnt wasnt cleanest beds comfortable clean sheets bathroom staff helpful polite money luxurious

Reviews.Title: “lock up your stuff!”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel february tour absolutely loved mexico city hotel location dont stay worth letting people afternoon hotel san francisco robbed literally 45 minutes checking left bags wander returned lock broken stuff gone hotel management somewhat helpful apologised moved nicer pretty hotel responsible hotel convenient walking pretty cheap pretty barren encourage staying valuables locked
